title: Seefer Elliot and the Darkness Within
description: After saving his school from an other-worldly attack, Seefer Elliot thought life would return to normal. What he didn't expect was the attention the event caused and how curiosity about a "flying boy" would begin to grow. Now faced with nemeses from this world and beyond, Seefer struggles to conceal his anonymity while learning to control his burgeoning powers. Though, he soon discovers that the advancing abilities carry a consequence that he had not prepared for.
author: Pat Mallon
